contextId.occurrenceNote: "take one of the three piles of hair" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-fraction]])
contextId.glQuote: take a third of the hair

contextId.occurrenceNote: "let the wind blow the last third of your hair in different directions" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-fraction]])
contextId.glQuote: scatter a third of it to the wind
